articles.description: The Blueshirts continued to ride high following Sunday's epic Stadium Series win by defeating the first-place Dallas Stars at home on Tuesday.
articles.content:
NEW YORK - In analyzing his underwhelming point total this season, Kaapo Kakko offered this blunt assessment.

articles.title: Will Kirk Cousins get a fully-guaranteed contract on the open market? - NBC Sports
articles.description: When quarterback Kirk Cousins became a free agent in 2018, he had two serious suitors: the Vikings and the Jets.
